TextLibrary.Text: Lad, I think ye've gone far enough. There canna be anythin' out here besides death and trouble.
Lad, I think ye've gone far enough. There canna be anythin' out here besides death and trouble.
Lass, I think ye've gone far enough. There canna be anythin' out here besides death and trouble.
Lass, I think ye've gone far enough. There canna be anythin' out here besides death and trouble.
Come on, Khalkus. I've put up with your incessant talking halfway across the world. Just trust me on this.
Come on, Khalkus. I've put up with your incessant talking halfway across the world. Just trust me on this.
Come on, Khalkus. I've put up with your incessant talking halfway across the world. Just trust me on this.
Come on, Khalkus. I've put up with your incessant talking halfway across the world. Just trust me on this.
I canna go no farther. There's only ruination ahead for all of us. I stop here, laddie and I suggest you do too. Come back to the Citadel and face Lord Bane with us.
I canna go no farther. There's only ruination ahead for all of us. I stop here, laddie and I suggest you do too. Come back to the Citadel and face Lord Bane with us.
I canna go no farther. There's only ruination ahead for all of us. I stop here, lassie and I suggest you do too. Come back to the Citadel and face Lord Bane with us.
